name: OCKAnimatedButton.HighlightOption
desc: A set of display options for the highlighted state of an animated button.

items.name: case fade(alpha: CGFloat)
items.desc: A case that specifies the opacity of the button when itâ€™s in a highlighted state.

items.name: static var defaultFade: OCKAnimatedButton<Content>.HighlightOption
items.desc: A default value for a button fade, which is 0.6 opacity.

items.name: case overlay(alpha: CGFloat)
items.desc: A case that specifies the opacity of an overlay, drawn over the button's content.

items.name: static var defaultOverlay: OCKAnimatedButton<Content>.HighlightOption
items.desc: A default value for the overlays opacity.

items.name: case delayOnSelect(delay: TimeInterval)
items.desc: A case that specifies how long to delay showing the highlighted state when a user taps the button.

items.name: static var defaultDelayOnSelect: OCKAnimatedButton<Content>.HighlightOption
items.desc: A default value for the amount of time to delay highlighting the button when a user taps it.
